repositories.brief_summary: Generational stack scanning merged for ARM64/POWER/RISC-V, new Sys.runtime_executable API, and toplevel printer system improvements merged.
repositories.new_features_summary: New Sys.runtime_executable API, generational stack scanning for multiple architectures, and improved toplevel/debugger printer machinery.
repositories.new_features:
- **Generational stack scanning** implemented for ARM64, POWER, and RISC-V architectures reduces minor GC work with deep call stacks [#13594](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13594) by [Xavier Leroy](https://github.com/xavierleroy)
- **New Sys.runtime_executable API** added to get the full path to the currently executing runtime, useful for distinguishing between ocamlrun and native executables [#13728](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13728) by [David Allsopp](https://github.com/dra27)
- **Improved toplevel printer machinery** now unified between toplevel and debugger with generalized polymorphic #install_printer support [#13969](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13969)
- **Manual organization** enhanced with TeX headers moved to extension-specific .etex files for better maintainability [#14041](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14041)
- **Unix.map_file memory tracking** in Gc.Memprof ensures all Bigarray memory managed by GC is properly tracked [#13675](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13675) by [Stephen Dolan](https://github.com/stedolan)
- **Better recursive module error messages** provide clearer diagnostics for invalid recursive module definitions [#13608](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13608)
- **Format module line breaking** fixes premature line breaks when break hints appear at line end [#13853](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13853) by [Florian Angeletti](https://github.com/Octachron)
- **TSan false positive fix** removes spurious data race reports between major GC and mutator [#13987](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13987) by [Olivier Nicole](https://github.com/OlivierNicole)
- **Ocamltest improvements** with better variable handling and environment variable fix [#13961](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13961)

- __RUMINANT:core__ **Generational stack scanning** implemented for ARM64, POWER, and RISC-V architectures reduces minor GC work with deep call stacks [ocaml/ocaml#13594](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13594) by [Xavier Leroy](https://github.com/xavierleroy)
- __RUMINANT:core__ **New Sys.runtime_executable API** added to get the full path to the currently executing runtime, useful for distinguishing between ocamlrun and native executables [ocaml/ocaml#13728](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13728) by [David Allsopp](https://github.com/dra27)
- __RUMINANT:core__ **Improved toplevel printer machinery** now unified between toplevel and debugger with generalized polymorphic #install_printer support [ocaml/ocaml#13969](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13969)
- __RUMINANT:core__ **Unix.map_file memory tracking** in Gc.Memprof ensures all Bigarray memory managed by GC is properly tracked [ocaml/ocaml#13675](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13675) by [Stephen Dolan](https://github.com/stedolan)
- __RUMINANT:core__ **Better recursive module error messages** provide clearer diagnostics for invalid recursive module definitions [ocaml/ocaml#13608](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13608)
- __RUMINANT:core__ **Format module line breaking** fixes premature line breaks when break hints appear at line end [ocaml/ocaml#13853](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13853) by [Florian Angeletti](https://github.com/Octachron)
- __RUMINANT:oxcaml__ **New `-save-ir-before` compiler flag** in [oxcaml/oxcaml](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml) allows saving intermediate representation before specified compilation passes [oxcaml/oxcaml#4000](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/4000)
- __RUMINANT:oxcaml__ **Separability axis basics** for layout types introduce new type system capabilities for tracking layout separability [oxcaml/oxcaml#3854](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/3854)
- __RUMINANT:oxcaml__ **Register allocation debugging tool** added to help analyze and debug register allocation passes in the compiler
- __RUMINANT:oxcaml__ **Repository layout restructured** in [janestreet/opam-repository](https://github.com/janestreet/opam-repository) for dune package management compatibility, moving packages to `packages/pkg/pkg.X.Y.Z` format [janestreet/opam-repository#54](https://github.com/janestreet/opam-repository/issues/54)

- __RUMINANT:oxcaml__ **CI enhancement** with automated 80-character line length checking [oxcaml/oxcaml#3989](https://github.com/oxcaml/oxcaml/issues/3989)
- __RUMINANT:multicore__ **Bounded queue performance** optimization in [ocaml-multicore/picos#368](https://github.com/ocaml-multicore/picos/issues/368) avoiding thundering herd problem with targeted signal calls
- __RUMINANT:multicore__ **Select wakeup logic** improvements in [ocaml-multicore/picos#367](https://github.com/ocaml-multicore/picos/issues/367) with refined state machine handling
- __RUMINANT:multicore__ **Documentation example** updated in [ocaml-multicore/picos#369](https://github.com/ocaml-multicore/picos/issues/369) from condition variables to semaphore-based bounded queue implementation
- __RUMINANT:ecosystem__ **Cryptographic infrastructure** mirage-crypto 2.0.1 with elliptic curve support across 6 packages [ocaml/opam-repository@ba91980](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/ba91980ef6f34b15ff7276dce6ad3c176853f06b)
- __RUMINANT:ecosystem__ **Event loop framework** nanoev 0.1 with Picos integration and HTTP server support [ocaml/opam-repository@369664e](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/369664ebf312afd25b6ba7cc0a3e6a2f29a0a28a)
